expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to Audit mode based on 'audit' keyword in arguments
Agent loads references/audit-guide.md for the audit procedure
Agent runs 'uv run python skills/skill-creator/scripts/audit.py skills/wargame/' to produce deterministic scores
Agent supplements script output with AI review using references/evaluation-rubric.md pressure testing protocol
Agent presents a graded report with dimension breakdown, pattern checklist, and top 3 improvement opportunities
